description:
Sid’s secret sabotage mission into Arachne’s research facility is jeopardized when Black☆Star arrives. Hoping to avenge Maka, the hot-headed Meister is looking for a fight - and Mifune is ready to oblige.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kenshi Tatsu - Aji wa Amai ka Shoppai ka?
Le dieu de l`épée revient. Un goût de sucre ou de sel ?
The Sword God Rises: Does It Have a Sweet or Salty Taste?
剣神立つ ~味は甘いかしょっぱいか?~
